my:Details.my:Title: Working in Remote and Confined Spaces

my:Hazard.my:Description: Restricted means of entry or exit and area for working , moving, turning.
my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: Consideration needs to be given the size and access to entrances and exits, the nature of the work and the equipment required to perform the job, physical environment including obstructions and fittings, equipment used to assist with safe entry and exit. Consideration should be given also if the required work to be performed can be done another way without entering the confined space.

my:Hazard.my:Description: Health. Exposure to irrespirable atmosphere, flammable, toxic and corrosive environment
my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: Use of PPE at all the times, consider ventilation and checking of the atmosphere with the oxygen meter available on board. Supervision by another person should be made. Use of mechanical fans can be helpful, breaks should be taken at regular intervals. Drink sufficient fluids (water) to avoid dehydration. Where possible, all adjacent machinery should be stopped, also heating of adjacent compartments if possible.

Use of suitable and appropriate PPE: overalls, safety shoes, hard hat, gloves, googles etc., suitable lifting equipment and chocks should be used when opening manholes. Consult "Manual Handling" Risk Assessment and CoSWP Manual.
Use of suitable and appropriate PPE, also war defenders. An alternative mean of communication may need to be established.

Use of suitable and appropriate PPE, safety harness if necessary. Adequate lighting to be provided and portable lighting to be provided if necessary. Safe measures to be placed nearby area where the work is performed.
